title: Patch 5.11 is Live - Got bugs, errors, let us know.

embed.description: Greetings Summoners! With every new patch Riot introduces to balance out champions and items there are some unforeseen issues that creep up and...

body:
Hello Everyone,

Patch 5.11 is live and currently Jayce + Caitlyn have been disabled due to in-game bugs discovered. The team is working on getting these champs fixed asap. 

I know that some of you will encounter issues as well, it happens. Please check the reddit bugs megathread here for most game bugs being reported (Our Dev team is actively tracking in this forum): http://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/399ni9/511_patch_bugs_megathread/

I hope you all have a great experience with the new patch, and enjoy the new changes. Please post here if you find yourself in need of some help though.

GL;HF
Riot Cochese

replies.body:
Hey Horse,

Caits ult wasn't working correctly, and Jayce had issues when changing forms on his hammer. The reddit thread goes into more details, but it definitely impacted game play and something we felt strongly enough to disable until a fix is made.

Curious about the patching issue you have, what happens and what do you do manually as a work around? Maybe we can work together to figure this out.

Thanks for the reply. I'm just interested in when things go wrong. Not because I'm pessimistic or anything, but it's so that I can learn from the past.

I think I had a little discussion about this with Riot Gehirn (I can't find it, though). Basically, whenever a patch is dropped, my patcher gets to 32% and then "An unspecified error has occurred." It stops right there until I close it. Retrying nets the same result.

I found out that it's doing this because it's failing to create the tag in the correct location saying that the files have been downloaded/patched in correctly at a certain point. To manually fix this, I create a blank file (with no extension) named "S_OK" in the latest version folder inside the "releases" folder. Upon opening League's patcher again, it's automatically at 32% and it starts scanning files, then it downloads the rest of the patch and it's A-OK.

I also noted that the "S_OK" file in consumed when this happens.

PS: I use 'DISCUSSION' view, so it's probably more organised if you use the "Reply" button to reply to me, instead of adding it above my message.

> [{quoted}](name=HORSE OF FORCE,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=WcLPlVFO,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-06-11T06:52:15.609+0000)
>
> Thanks for the reply. I'm just interested in when things go wrong. Not because I'm pessimistic or anything, but it's so that I can learn from the past.
> 
> I think I had a little discussion about this with Riot Gehirn (I can't find it, though). Basically, whenever a patch is dropped, my patcher gets to 32% and then "An unspecified error has occurred." It stops right there until I close it. Retrying nets the same result.
> 
> I found out that it's doing this because it's failing to create the tag in the correct location saying that the files have been downloaded/patched in correctly at a certain point. To manually fix this, I create a blank file (with no extension) named "S_OK" in the latest version folder inside the "releases" folder. Upon opening League's patcher again, it's automatically at 32% and it starts scanning files, then it downloads the rest of the patch and it's A-OK.
> 
> I also noted that the "S_OK" file in consumed when this happens.
> 
> PS: I use 'DISCUSSION' view, so it's probably more organised if you use the "Reply" button to reply to me, instead of adding it above my message.

Interesting bug, Ill see if I can find anything out from our patcher team.

Hi guys,

I played on a patch 5.11 last night.

This afternoon I went to load up the client and it was stuck at 33% and said "Files Scanning".

This got upto 6k files scanned till I gave up and hit the forums for advice.

Since then I have completly deleted and redownloaded the client, and also tried the "S_OK" blank file trick.

I still how-ever am getting the same thing were I have to scan an unlimited(?) amount of files..

This is only happening on my laptop so its a funny error.

Any help would be appreciated!
You sure you started it in admin mode when restarting League? Also, if you do it again, you need to create the blank file again, as it's consumed upon opening League, no matter the circumstances.
It's stopped now, don't know what caused it, don't know what fixed it but hey it's ok now and thanks anyways
Probably entirely server-side, then. Also, in future, try to use "Reply" to respond to people. That way they get notification.
Also I'm with TPG moving over to Telstra soon-ish
yeah I have used the DNS setting thing but I still can't connect, it's really annoying
I can't connect to Chat services? I don't think this is because of something at my end because I can still play fine. Please help.

What ISP do you got?

Have you tried [using another DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#wq5) (temp. fix usually)?

Hi,

I play with HUD scale set to 0. In the previous patch it was fine, however now I notice several things wrong:

1. Text seems to overlap the UI slightly (for example the character information at the bottom left of the screen, or in the middle at the bottom)
2. Chat size is being affected by HUD scale. So even though chat scale is set to 100, it's literally impossible to see.
3. Death recap is being affected by HUD scale, making it impossible to see.

> [{quoted}](name=FrozenFlame,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=WcLPlVFO,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-06-12T06:50:13.608+0000)
>
> Hi,
> 
> I play with HUD scale set to 0. In the previous patch it was fine, however now I notice several things wrong:
> 
> 1. Text seems to overlap the UI slightly (for example the character information at the bottom left of the screen, or in the middle at the bottom)
> 2. Chat size is being affected by HUD scale. So even though chat scale is set to 100, it's literally impossible to see.
> 3. Death recap is being affected by HUD scale, making it impossible to see.

Hi Frozen,

I've passed that along to our HUD team and will let you know what I hear back. Thanks for reporting the issue.

What were the bugs that were happening with Caitlyn and Jayce? Just curious. :P

Note: My patcher once again failed to download the patch, but I'm well experienced with how to repair it manually. Is this issue ever going to be looked into?
